data.subject: [Stock Alert] Canon EOS R6 Stock Below Safety Threshold
data.body:
Dear Purchasing Manager,

The system has detected that the following product's stock level is below the safety threshold. Please take immediate action:

## Product Information
- **Product Name**: Canon EOS R6
- **SKU**: CANON-EOS-R6
- **Current Stock**: 4
- **Safety Threshold**: 8
- **Supplier**: Canon Professional
- **Supplier Contact**: pro@canon.com.cn

## Action Required
Please review the stock levels and consider placing a purchase order to replenish inventory.

For detailed information and to update the purchase requisition list, please visit the Google Sheets link: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JtHoy0oCgyCUvx9fBjBUzXWCOGwW_-RvNYKj1Hn2k3Y/edit

Best regards,
Stock Alert System
